title: 215 20 "Screaming-Hot Bombardment! Pirate Dodgeball!"Transliteration: "Unaru Netsukyū Gōkyu! Kaizoku Dojjibōru!" (Japanese:うなる熱球剛球! 海賊ドッジボール!) Ken Koyama Hirohiko Kamisaka January 9, 2005(2005-01-09)[19] July 14, 2013
